description:
This episode of Meisaku is inspired by "Urashima Taro" from the children`s song. Bolt can not sing the song "Urashima Taro" to the end. An "Utashima Taro" appears and tries to teach him the correct lyrics...and fails.
Utashima Taro is voiced by Yuyu-uta, a YouTuber.
Source: crunchyroll
